document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R18-021
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R18-021
Approving the I.H.S. Community Health Representative Program Beginning FY 2019
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 19th day of September, 2018, the following Resolution was adopted:

container.heading: Approving the I.H.S. Community Health Representative Program Beginnig FY 2019

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R18-021

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America.

recital.text: the voters of the Pueblo approved a new Governing Agreement ("Agreement") for the Pueblo on November 19, 2011, and the Bureau of Indian Affairs approved the Agreement on December 21, 2011 pursuant to Federal law; and

para.text: The voters of the Pueblo approved a new Governing Agreement ("Agreement") for the Pueblo on November 19, 2011, and the Bureau of Indian Affairs approved the Agreement on December 21, 2011 pursuant to Federal law.

recital.text: the Pueblo Council ("Council") is the duly constituted Legislative body acting for the Pueblo; and

para.text: The Pueblo Council ("Council") is the duly constituted Legislative body acting for the Pueblo.

recital.text: the Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement; and

para.text: The Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement.

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso is currently a participant in the Public Health Service, Indian Health Service (IHS), Community Health Representative (CHR) Program; and

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso is currently a participant in the Public Health Service, Indian Health Service (IHS), Community Health Representative (CHR) Program.

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso acknowledges the benefits received from the CHR Program, both previous and current, in the area of community health care; and

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso acknowledges the benefits received from the CHR Program, both previous and current, in the area of community health care.

recital.text: the Tribal Government recognizes the need to continue the CHR Program for a period of three years during which the program will provide those services for the community that cannot otherwise be provided.

para.text: The Tribal Government recognizes the need to continue the CHR Program for a period of three years during which the program will provide those services for the community that cannot otherwise be provided.

The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council requests the Public Health Service, Indian Health Service, to enter a new contract agreement with the Pueblo de San Ildefonso for a Community Health Representative Program for a three year period beginning January 1, 2019 and ending December 31, 2021, and

The authority granted by the Resolution shall remain in effect until withdrawn by the Tribal Council or until the term of the contract has expired, and that the Governor is the authorized agent for the Tribe and shall represent the Council in any negotiations, changes and/or approval of the contract agreement.

The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council requests the Public Health Service, Indian Health Service, to enter a new contract agreement with the Pueblo de San Ildefonso for a Community Health Representative Program for a three year period beginning January 1, 2019 and ending December 31, 2021, and

The authority granted by the Resolution shall remain in effect until withdrawn by the Tribal Council or until the term of the contract has expired, and that the Governor is the authorized agent for the Tribe and shall represent the Council in any negotiations, changes and/or approval of the contract agreement.

recital.text: that the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this Resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this Resolution.

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this Resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this Resolution.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on September 19, 2018, at a meeting with a vote of 10 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 0 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
COUNCIL REPRESENTATIVE SPONSOR(S): CR Thelma Gonzales
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R18-021 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 19th day of September, 2018, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4 (c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.
{ } VETO - RETURNED TO COUNCIL WITH EXPLANATION:
